Description:
TasksMust Have Skills/Experience:Strong experience in web and mobile application development using Angular, Django, Kotlin, and Swift.
Proficient in using Git for version control and collaborating with teams.
Experience with cloud platforms such as Cloud Foundry, AWS, or Azure.
Experience with relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQL Server.
Experience with messaging systems such as RabbitMQ or Apache Kafka.
Familiarity with agile development methodologies and ceremonies.Good To Have Skills/Experience:Familiarity with containerization using Docker or Kubernetes.
Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) tools such as Jenkins and/or AWS Code Pipeline.
Familiarity with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Knowledge of location-based services and APIs such as HERE Maps or Google Maps.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with different teams to understand and modify application architecture.
Participate in the design and implementation of software solutions that meet business requirements.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to established coding standards.
Perform code reviews and ensure the quality of the codebase.
Participate in testing, debugging, and troubleshooting of software applications.
Contribute to the documentation of software requirements, design, and implementation.
Stay up to date with the latest technology trends and share knowledge with the team.
Participate in Agile/Scrum development methodology and ceremonies.Must Have Skills/Experience:Strong experience in web and mobile application development using Angular, Django, Kotlin, and Swift.
Proficient in using Git for version control and collaborating with teams.
